Document (document)¶

Document¶

The document package contains classes for visual interactive editing of a Scheme instance.

The SchemeEditWidget is the main widget used for editing. It uses classes defined in canvas to display the scheme. It also supports undo/redo functionality.

    • Scheme Editor Widget
